pullRequest.title: HDFS-15168: ABFS enhancement to translate AAD to Linux identities.
pullRequest.bodyText:
ABFS driver enhancement - Allow customizable translation from AAD SPNs and security groups to Linux user and group
Integration Test results - East US2:
Tests run: 1283, Failures: 0, Errors: 0, Skipped: 404

nodes.bodyText: nit, add "." at the end o

nodes.bodyText: import grouping; split up and place the org.apache.* block in its own group below the slf4j ones
there's a lot of duplication here. can't you just buid one long string and write it in one go?

you are expecting the lookup to raise an IOE?
I'd prefer using LambaTestUtils.intercept, as the assertion raised there will include the string value of the closure if it unexpectedly didn't fail. Better for debugging

commit.message: HDFS-15168: ABFS enhancement to translate AAD to Linux identities.
